Html:
Hi,

Congratulations for this awesome component!

the GMapControl.DisableAltForSelection was a good addition to allow full customization on map mouse navigation. And now, i think it should be useful to have another property.

It would be helpful to have a property to change the mouse button for area selection, similar to the GMapControl.DragButton.  This is useful to allow the drag function with left button (as maps.google.com), and zoom to area using the right button (GMapControl.SelectionButton for instance).

Best regards.

Sergio
